about.title: About the Canada Labour Research Assistant (CLaRA)
about.welcome: Welcome to the Canada Labour Research Assistant. You can use this tool to ask questions about anything related to labour standards, occupational health and safety, workers' compensation, etc.
about.note: Please note that it is *not* designed for casual conversation but rather to assist you in your research.
about.documents_tab: The **documents** tab provides direct access to the sources used by the assistant in responding to your questions. Some of the formatting may be unintelligible as a result of the file conversions.
about.metadata_tab: The **metadata** tab provides you with direct access to the hyperlinks of the sources so you can access them in their original context as web pages.
about.TOS: If you use this assistant in 'remote mode', your data and/or any confidential information you include in your queries will **not be protected**.
